siteMetadata.title: Kamil Rybacki's site
siteMetadata.description: My personal portfolio and blogging site

nodes.excerpt:
At the beginning of 2022, I've made a decision to host my personal website
using GitHub Pages service and Gatsby, while also incorporating TypeScript
instead of vanilla JavaScript to get my feet wet…

This project was created  over the course of February and March 
during my deep dive into  dockerizing local services  to create my own  homelab .
Due to the fact I am a 3D printing hobbyist,
I've…
